title: Stylish Hervey Bay Self-Contained Apartments Near Beachfront with Lagoon Pool
description: Experience the tranquil beauty of Queensland's Fraser Coast with a relaxing stay along the shimmering waterfront of Hervey Bay. From the comfort of BreakFree Great Sandy Straits Hervey Bay, enjoy stunning views of the marina, or spend your days exploring the World Heritage-listed Fraser Island, spotting humpback whales or fishing in the Great Sandy Strait. Back at the hotel, enjoy a refreshing dip in the large lagoon pool or a friendly game of table tennis.
location_description: BreakFree Great Sandy Straits Hervey Bay
